Package zuul.Players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
zuul.Players.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComputerControlledPlayer, HumanPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.

This class represents an abstract Player within the Game class This class enforces a structure and functionality that every player class should have
